originalText.text:
Highly recommended  ðŸ¥ŠðŸ’¯

The coaches here are legit. They've got real fight experience and they're dedicated to helping everyone reach their goals. Each coach has their own personal flare and I suggest learning from each and every coach!

The atmosphere at the gym is friendly and welcoming to people of all skill levels. The Zombie community has people from all walks of life, and I've made some cool friends here.

The facility is clean, two floors for training, lockers, and showers. There is also the bonus of weight lifting equipment.

The location is also conveniently located at the Union Square area.

originalText.text: Highly recommend this gym for any skill level. There are a set of classes for each experience level, and all of the coaches are knowledgable, experienced, and eager to teach. Everyone at the gym is welcoming and friendly. I've been going here for about 6 months now and I tell people to join every chance I get. This gym will teach you a lot about martial arts and you will join an awesome community

originalText.text: This is my favorite Muay Thai gym in the city. The coaches, staff, and members are all super friendly and makes you feel like part of the community. Great for both cardio and strength and conditioning. Highly recommend for anyone looking to try martial arts/Muay Thai!

text.text: This is my favorite Muay Thai gym in the city. The coaches, staff, and members are all super friendly and makes you feel like part of the community. Great for both cardio and strength and conditioning. Highly recommend for anyone looking to try martial arts/Muay Thai!

originalText.text: Zombie Muay Thai is a fantastic gym to train muay thai. The owner John and his staff of trainers are all very skilled in their craft. They are beyond effective in teaching, as they are constantly working with students to ensure a drill is understood and performed correctly. Not to mention this gym is extremely clean. Zombie provides an excellent environment for beginners, where you can perform drills and practice them in a safe sparring environment, if you so choose. I personally have recommended this place to my friends and will continue to do so.

originalText.text: Amazing new Muay Thai gym near Union Square with staff made up of professional champion fighters!  ZMT is a warm, friendly community and its brand new facility is super clean and welcoming!  Would highly recommend to anyone trying out kickboxing for the first time or a seasoned professional.
